description: Two ancient human figures are depicted in a vast desert landscape featuring sand dunes, rock formations, and cactuses. Unexpectedly, they have encountered a modern public water fountain in this prehistoric setting. One figure is shown drinking directly from the spigot, while the other looks on with apparent disapproval. This juxtaposition creates an absurd scene, highlighting the anachronistic presence of modern convenience in a primitive environment. The watching figure's concern about hygiene at the fountain introduces an ironic commentary on modern sensibilities applied to a primitive context.
caption: “Hey c'mon! Don't put your mouth on it!”
